summarized_tuple: Vivian is 22 years old, studying computer science with a part-time job.
Vivian prefers sightseeing and prioritizes food during vacations.
Vivian prefers budget-friendly options over other travel modes.
Vivian enjoyed shopping in her favorite trip to Hong Kong.
Vivian prefers relaxing vacations with her family in Greece.
Vivian has a trip to Seoul, Korea coming up.
